data.name: Add Announcement data for mobile push
data.queryText:
select  a.uniqueId,
a.recordType,announcementLink, a.userid,channel
from {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/704d45b0-485c-ed11-ba55-f40343ce89d0/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/704d45b0-485c-ed11-ba55-f40343ce89d0/data/name}}] as a
where concat(a.announcementId, a.contactId, a.startDate,a.endDate) 
not IN (select  uniqueId from {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/714d45b0-485c-ed11-ba55-f40343ce89d0/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/714d45b0-485c-ed11-ba55-f40343ce89d0/data/name}}])
and channel like '%Mobile Push%'
